ygData.subject: I hope the Chivtrons are ready!
ygData.msgSnippet: Birdbot and Paper stop in front of the Chivtron base. McGowan, Virgo, Barrymore, Lee, Depp and Alba walk up behind the two. McGowan: Hey! Birdbot looks at

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Birdbot and Paper stop in front of the Chivtron base. McGowan, Virgo, Barry=
more, Lee, Depp and Alba walk up behind the two.

McGowan: Hey!

Birdbot lo=
oks at McGowan.

Birdbot: Rah rah....

McGowan scoffs and ignores Birdbot.
=

Virgo: Hey! All you sorry sons a bitches! You ready to rock!?!?

Hazel wal=
ks out of her room and near the entrance. She hears Virgo's yelling and gas=
ps. Her gasp was a gasp a glee and joy.

Hazel: Cerulean! Bronze! Come here=
!

Cerulean and Bronze stop in the hall and walk up to Hazel.

Hazel: You g=
uys, a fight! Isn't this great!

Cerulean smirks and runs off to get the ot=
hers together.

Bronze: This is great! Some asses to kick!

Hazel: I've bee=
n waiting for this. We'll be the firsts out there.

Bronze: We get the most=
 action!

Hazel: The most scars!

Cerulean leads Periwinkle, Pink White and=
 Brown over to Hazel and Bronze.

Cerulean: Ready.

Hazel sends Periwinkle,=
 Pink, White and Brown out first and her, Cerulean and Bronze slowly step o=
ut.

Virgo: Look at this. Look at this.

Virgo laughs while pointing at Pin=
k running towards her. Virgo allows Pink's shots to hit. She trips Pink and=
 catches her. She brutally beats down at Pink with one fist and spins her a=
round, powerbombing her ontop of several sharp rocks. Virgo climbs to her f=
eet. Pink gasps, not able to breath form the shock and pain. She squirms ar=
ound, clutching at the rock impaled in her back. Hazel stares at Virgo's co=
ld smile. Hazel laughs some, at the same time McGowan laughs.

Hazel: Go.

=
Brown begins running. Depp begins walking. Brown lets out a battle cry whil=
e Depp laughs some. Brown begins firing his gun at Depp as they became dang=
erously close. Depp swings his sword. Brown stares in horror as his hand dr=
ops to the ground. Depp raises a gun and shoots Brown in the head. He colla=
pses. McGowan raises a hand, signaling for Virgo and Depp to step back. The=
y follow her orders and stand beside her. Birdbot and Papertron haven't att=
acked yet. They were waiting for Aerotaur, Nightlight and Trinity. Virgo wa=
s also waiting for that certain someone.

Virgo: Furry bitch furry bitch...=
.Gonna be so frigging dead....

Hazel, White and Periwinkle begin walking t=
owards the attackers. Birdbot's eyes change color. Then, without warning, h=
e flies at Hazel. She gasps and grabs White, pulling her in front of hersel=
f, for protection. Birdbot digs his talons into White's chest. After severa=
l cracks, his feet bust through White's back and start trying to grab Hazel=
, but can't reach. He rips his feet back out of White, sending blood flying=
. Hazel blocks a fleet of shots from McGowan with White before dropping her=
. White stares, wide eyed. Her fingers twitch as she lays on the ground. Ha=
zel looks at McGowan, whose smile had brightened. Hazel runs back over to C=
erulean, Bronze and Periwinkle.

Hazel: Damn, their good. I've got to admit=
 that.

Hazel watches Lee and Barrymore brutally kick Pink and Brown while =
a puddle of blood forms around White.

Bronze: Maybe I'll kick ass another =
day...

Papertron: ERF FER FER FER!...

Papertron flexes while Birdbot dema=
nds Doritos...
